author: Timothy McLean
text:
We are in the process of creating an ordinance that would permit medical marijuana caregiver/grow operations in areas zoned Light Industrial. We felt that the activities associated with caregivers was consistent with permitted uses within those areas. Caregivers would still have to comply with the terms of the Michigan Medical Marijuana Act. 
I was just curious to see if any other communities have done something similar?
title: Medical Marijuana
